# itemTime

**Instance Property**

The time to seek to in the item timeline.

## Declaration

```swift
var itemTime: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion



## Accessing command details

- **shouldBufferInAnticipationOfPlayback**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player starts buffering in anticipation of a request to begin playback.
- **anticipatedPlaybackRate**: The rate at which the coordinator expects playback to resume.
- **completionDueDate**: The deadline by which the coordinator expects the delegate to handle the command.
